name: Inhume
description:
Khelo Bangladesh proudly presents to you Inhume, developed by Khelo Internal and Team71.

Inhume is a top down shooter inspired by Alien Shooter, which we played and enjoyed, featuring the struggle of three heros across three timeline to save and find the cure of inhume, a pluge that rises creatures from the dark, unknown to all about its origin, but entirely wiped out the human race in near future.

Make your way through endless hordes, survive till you can, choose from three character and three level, the chase is on and the battle awaits.

For more information please visit

http://khelobangladesh.com/

Like us in facebook: https://www.facebook.com/khelobd/
